participant_abstract.sent: We introduced ourselves to one another.
We then broadly went over what we will need to do, in terms of the overall design, to successfully carry out the development of our product, a remote control.
Some considerations were discussed as well as a general brainstorming as to what might be innovative.

participant_decisions.sent: To work on the project from our respective areas and to treat as real what others have to say.
the remote must be simple, fashionable, it must have 'something different' we must consider to whom the remote will be marketed.
there might be a trade-off b/w functionality and aesthetic value.
